text.data-name: She picked up her special stone. She held it in her hand. Suddenly she heard a voice say “Hello, dear friend” It was the stone

svg.text: She picked up her special stone. She held it in her hand. Suddenly she heard a voice say “Hello, dear friend”It was the stone speaking.A talking stone? Inara was surprised. How could a stone talk?

text.data-name: “Hello,” she said. “you can talk!” “Yes, I talk when I have something special to say. I will tell you about my adventures toda

svg.text: “Hello,” she said.“you can talk!” “Yes,I talk when I have something special to say.I will tell you about my adventures today.
